issue.title: [CF 1144] Player Cooldowns shown for Party1-4
issue.body:
TMW 7.3.5

I think I reported this before but didn't have an error to match it will.

I've only seen this in skirmishes, sometimes it stays for the duration of the match in a 2s skirm, sometimes when I'm doing a 3s skirm after the 3rd person loads in (I'll only see my own cooldowns when the 2nd person zones in) the auras will go away, assuming Party1/2 isn't a warrior to make it load properly.

26x ...nts\IconTypes\IconType_unitcooldown\unitcooldown.lua:431: attempt to index field '?' (a nil value)
...nts\IconTypes\IconType_unitcooldown\unitcooldown.lua:431: in function `UpdateFunction'
TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:658: in function <TellMeWhen\Components\Core\Icon.lua:637>
(tail call): ?
[C]: ?
[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:9: in function <[string "safecall Dispatcher[1]"]:5>
(tail call): ?
TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-7.3.5.lua:3123: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:3084>

Locals:
nil


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1144 | Raw

comments.body:
(Changed status to bump this up to the top. I should probably fix this one since it looks to be an easy fix)
